description: This patient encounter table contains Professional Billing Hospital Professional Fee encounters. The primary key for the patient encounter table is PAT_ENC_CSN_ID.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this encounter in your system. The integer portion of the number specifies the date of the encounter. Digits after the decimal point indicate multiple visits on one day.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: For Hospital Professional Fee encounters, this is the admit date in calendar format.

columns.name: HPF_ENC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Hospital Professional Fee encounter status category ID for the patient.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Posted


Completed


Released


Post/Billed


Comp/Billed


Deleted

columns.name: HPF_EM_CODE_REQ_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the Hospital Professional Fee encounter for the patient�meets E&M code requirements.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: AR_HPF_ENC_VST_CSN
columns.description: This column contains the contact serial number which links the hospital professional fee (HPF)�contact with the visit contact. This CSN is the unique contact serial number for the visit contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).
